text.p: The following are reports carried by Estonia's newspapers on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these reports and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- A new oil tanker wharf was opened in the port city of Muuga by the Estonian-Dutch company Pakterminal.
- Average per capita income in July was 1,544 kroons.
- Visa free travel between Estonia and Finland may come in force at the turn of year, Prime Minister Tiit Vahi said at a news conference on Tuesday.
- Twelve-year old Tallinner Juri Saks came second at the LEGO world championship in Denmark.
- A 14-year old boy was killed in the Lasnamae district of Tallin when a bomb made by a group of youngsters exploded.
